verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Everyone needs compassion newline Love that's never failing newline Let mercy fall on me newline Everyone needs forgiveness newline The kindness of a Savior newline The hope of nations

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Savior newline He can move the mountains newline My God is Mighty to save newline He is mighty to save newline Forever newline Author of salvation newline He rose and conquered the grave newline Jesus conquered the grave

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So take me as you find me newline All my fears and failures newline Fill my life again newline I give my life to follow newline Everything I believe in newline Now I surrender

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Shine Your light newline and let the whole world see newline We're singing newline For the glory of the risen King newline Jesus, Shine your light newline and let the whole world see newline We're singing newline for the glory of the risen King
